mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID 'id', USER_PASSWORD 'password', USER_CODE 'userCode', USER_TELEPHONE 'telephone', USER_NAME 'userName', USER_EMAIL 'email', USER_ADDRESS 'address', UPDATE_TIME 'updateTime', CREATE_TIME 'createTime', USER_AVATAR 'avatar' FROM ss_user WHERE USER_CODE = #{username}

SELECT USER_ID 'id', USER_CODE 'userCode', USER_NAME 'userName',USER_AVATAR 'avatar', USER_ADDRESS 'address', USER_TELEPHONE 'telephone', USER_EMAIL 'email', STATE 'state' FROM ss_user WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ss_user_favorite(USER_ID, FAVORITE_ARTICLE_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) VALUES(#{userId}, #{articleId}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STATE = '1', UPDATE_TIME = NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE ss_user_favorite SET STATE = '0' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and FAVORITE_ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ss_user_favorite WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and FAVORITE_ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} and STATE = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ss_user_follow WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and FOLLOW_USER_ID = #{authorId} and STATE = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ss_user_follow(USER_ID, FOLLOW_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME) VALUES(#{followerId}, #{authorId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STATE = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE ss_user_follow SET STATE = '0' WHERE USER_ID = #{followerId} and FOLLOW_USER_ID = #{authorId}
UPDATE ss_user SET USER_AVATAR = #{avatar} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT su.USER_ID 'id', su.USER_Name 'userName' FROM ss_user su, ss_user_follow suf WHERE su.USER_ID = suf.USER_ID AND suf.FOLLOW_USER_ID = #{id} AND suf.STATE = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE ss_user SET USER_ADDRESS = #{address}, USER_NAME = #{userName} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
